gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nuggets 115, Celtics 109
gameRecap.excerpt: Denver defeats Boston, 115-109. For Denver, Nikola Jokic led the way as he recorded his 20th triple-double of the season with 32 points, 12 rebounds and 11 assists while aided by Jamal Murray recording 19 points, six rebounds, eight assists, and two steals in the victory. Jaylen Brown recorded a season-high 41 points, 14 rebounds, and two steals with Kristaps Porzingis tallying 24 points and 12 rebounds for Boston in the losing effort. Denver improves to 43-20 on the season, while Boston moves to 48-14 with the loss.
